title: Daily Deals: PlayStation VR2, Final Fantasy VII Rebirth, Spider-Man 2, and More

description: Deadpool & Wolverine had the largest R-rated global box office opening ever with a staggering $438.3 million and the eighth-biggest domestic weekend box office debut of all time with ticket sales reaching $205 million.
title: Deadpool & Wolverine Had the Largest R-Rated Global Box Office Opening Ever With $438.3 Million

description: In an interview with IGN, The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power showrunners reveal that Sauron will take "a few different forms" in Season 2, and go into more detail on one of those forms.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power Showrunners Reveal Another Sauron Form in Season 2 | SDCC 2024

description: Why has Marvel cast Robert Downey, Jr. as Doctor Doom. What connection do Doom and Iron Man have? Here's what you need to know.
title: How Can Robert Downey, Jr. Be Doctor Doom? The Shared History Between Doom and Iron Man Explained

description: Robert Downey, Jr. is back in the MCU, incredibly enough, as Doctor Doom in Avengers: Doomsday. And really, there was no other choice to replace Kang the Conqueror.
title: Why Doctor Doom Was the Only Choice for the MCU’s New Thanos

description: Robert Downey Jr. was revealed to be playing Doctor Doom in the newly-retitled Avengers: Doomsday, causing Doctor Doom and Jonathan Majors to trend worldwide as fans reacted to the stunning news.
title: Marvel Fans React to Robert Downey Jr's Shocking Return as Doctor Doom | SDCC 2024

description: The MCU has just cast its Doctor Doom for the upcoming film Avengers: Doomsday, and it's...wait, Robert Downey Jr.?
title: MCU's Doctor Doom Cast at Last for Avengers: Doomsday, and It's Robert Downey Jr. | SDCC 2024

description: Avengers: Infinity War and Avengers: Endgame directors The Russo Brothers are officially returning to direct both the newly named Avengers: Doomsday and Avengers: Secret Wars. As if that wasn't enough, it was also confirmed that Robert Downey Jr. will be taking on the role of Dr. Doom.
title: The Russo Brothers Are Officially Returning to Direct Avengers: Doomsday and Avengers: Secret Wars | SDCC 2024

description: At SDCC 2024, Fantastic Four director Matt Shakman confirmed that the upcoming film will be set in a retro futuristic 1960s.
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps Revealed as Full Title Along With First Footage, Confirmation It's Set in the 60s | SDCC 2024

description: SDCC 2024 gave Marvel fans with a first look at the upcoming MCU film Thunderbolts*, which will hit theatres on May 2, 2025.
title: Thunderbolts* First Official Clip Shows Stunts, First Look at the Team Together - SDCC 2024

description: Captain America: Brave New World kicked off Marvel's San Diego Comic-Con panel with brand-new footage confirming the origin of adamantium in the MCU from the body of Eternals' Celestial Tiamut, the White House being blown up, and so much more.
title: Captain America Comic-Con Footage Confirms Origin of MCU's Adamantium and Blows Up the White House | SDCC 2024

description: Marvel officially revealed at San Diego Comic-Con that Giancarlo Esposito will play Sidewinder, the leader of the Serpent Society, in next year’s Captain America: Brave New World.
title: Giancarlo Esposito's Captain America Role Revealed to be Leader of the Serpent Society | SDCC 2024

description: While we don't know much about Matt Reeves' The Batman - Part II, the director did confirm at San Diego Comic-Con that Colin Farrell will return as The Penguin.
title: The Batman 2 Director Matt Reeves Confirms Colin Farrell Will Return as The Penguin | SDCC 2024

description: Marvel Studios dropped into SDCC 2024 with bombshell reveals for movies like Avengers: Doomsday, The Fantastic Four: First Steps, and...is that Robert Downey Jr.?
title: Everything Announced at the Marvel Studios San Diego Comic-Con 2024 Panel

description: The Batman spin-off series The Penguin has not only received a new trailer at San Diego Comic-Con that introduces Gotham's violent gang war and the dangerous Sofia Falcone aka The Hangman, but it also was given a September 19, 2024, Max premiere date.
title: The Penguin Comic-Con Trailer Introduces Gotham's Violent Gang War, Official Release Date | SDCC 2024
